docs.snippet: A joint U.S.-Afghan raid Thursday against the Taliban involving NATO airstrikes left 26 civilians and three Afghan troops dead, and two U.S. soldiers were killed in a separate incident, Western and local officials said, as investigators worked to ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A joint U.S.-Afghan raid Thursday against the Taliban involving NATO airstrikes left 26 civilians and three Afghan troops dead, and two U.S. soldiers were killed in a separate incident, Western and local officials said, as investigators worked to determine what went wrong.

headline.main: 26 Civilians Dead After Afghan Raid on Taliban
headline.print_headline: 26 Civilians Dead After Afghan Raid on Taliban

docs.snippet: A 2012 examination of the route, published in one-mile increments, was truncated by Hurricane Sandy. The writer returns, four years later, for the final two miles (and 385 yards)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 2012 examination of the route, published in one-mile increments, was truncated by Hurricane Sandy. The writer returns, four years later, for the final two miles (and 385 yards).

headline.main: Diary of a New York City Marathon, Now With a Finishing Kick
